pull.title: tests: Add fuzzing harness for CHash{160,256}, C{HMAC_,}SHA{1,256,512}, CRIPEMD160, CSipHasher, etc.
pull.body:
Add fuzzing harness for `CHash{160,256}`, `C{HMAC_,}SHA{1,256,512}`, `CRIPEMD160`, `CSipHasher`, etc.

See [`doc/fuzzing.md`](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/fuzzing.md) for information on how to fuzz Bitcoin Core. Don't forget to contribute any coverage increasing inputs you find to the [Bitcoin Core fuzzing corpus repo](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/qa-assets).

Happy fuzzing :)

events.message: tests: Add fuzzing harness for CHash{160,256}, C{HMAC_,}SHA{1,256,512}, CRIPEMD160, CSipHasher, etc.

issue.title: tests: Add fuzzing harness for AES{CBC,}256{Encrypt,Decrypt}, poly1305_auth, CHKDF_HMAC_SHA256_L32, ChaCha20 and ChaCha20Poly1305AEAD
issue.body:
Add fuzzing harness for `AES{CBC,}256{Encrypt,Decrypt}`, `poly1305_auth`, `CHKDF_HMAC_SHA256_L32`, `ChaCha20` and `ChaCha20Poly1305AEAD`.

See [`doc/fuzzing.md`](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/fuzzing.md) for information on how to fuzz Bitcoin Core. Don't forget to contribute any coverage increasing inputs you find to the [Bitcoin Core fuzzing corpus repo](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/qa-assets).

Happy fuzzing :)

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #19296 (tests: Add fuzzing harness for AES{CBC,}256{Encrypt,Decrypt}, poly1305_auth, CHKDF_HMAC_SHA256_L32, ChaCha20 and ChaCha20Poly1305AEAD by practicalswift)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

issue.title: Add seeds
issue.body:
Add 437 seeds to old fuzzers in order to increase coverage while waiting for new coverage increasing fuzzers to be reviewed :)

New fuzzers waiting for review:
* [tests: Add fuzzing harness for CAddrMan. Fill some fuzzing coverage gaps.](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19065)
* [tests: Add fuzzing harness for CNode](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19067)
* [tests: Add fuzzing harnesses for CAutoFile, CBufferedFile, LoadExternalBlockFile and other FILE* consumers](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19143)
* [net: Add regression fuzz harness for CVE-2017-18350. Add FuzzedSocket. Add thin SOCKET wrapper.](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19203)
* [tests: Add fuzzing harness for BanMan](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19222)
* [tests: Add fuzzing harness for LoadMempool(...) and DumpMempool(...)](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19259)
* [tests: Add fuzzing harness for CHash{160,256}, C{HMAC_,}SHA{1,256,512}, CRIPEMD160, CSipHasher, etc.](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19286)
* [tests: Add fuzzing harness for TorController](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19288)
* [tests: Add fuzzing harness for AES{CBC,}256{Encrypt,Decrypt}, poly1305_auth, CHKDF_HMAC_SHA256_L32, ChaCha20 and ChaCha20Poly1305AEAD](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19296)

Review welcome :)

issue.title: Add MuHash3072 implementation
issue.body: This is the first split of #18000 which implements the Muhash algorithm and uses it to calculate the UTXO set hash in `gettxoutsetinfo`.

issue.title: build: Cross-compiling libbitcoinconsensus for Windows fails with DEBUG=1
issue.body:
```

$ ./autogen.sh 
$ CONFIG_SITE=$PWD/depends/x86_64-w64-mingw32/share/config.site ./configure --disable-wallet --disable-tests --disable-bench --without-utils --without-daemon --without-gui
```
